summary: This nice little mod adds the ovens, introduced with Hearthfire, to various locations around Skyrim, enabling the player to make a nice crostata or apple pie, without having to build a new house, just for the sake of it.
descriptionHtml:
[b]HEARTHFIRE DLC NEEDED[/b]

[b]The mod adds ovens - the basic baking utility, introduced with the Hearthfire DLC, to various locations, including some player homes, around the major cities of Skyrim. No longer does the player need to build a new home, if he or she wants to bake, but can now do this, simply by using one of the ten new ovens, scattered throughout Skyrim.[/b]

The locations of the ovens:

[b]Solitude:[/b]
[list][*] Proudspire Manor
[*] The Blue Palace (kitchen)
[*] The Winking Skeever Inn[/list]

[b]Riften:[/b]
[list][*] The Bee and the Barb (cellar)[/list]

[b]Whiterun:[/b]
[list][*] The Bannered Mare (kitchen)[/list]

[b]Windhelm:[/b]
[list][*] Hjerim
[*] Palace of the Kings (Kitchen)
[*] Candlehearth Hall[/list]

[b]Markarth[/b]
[list][*] Vlindrel Hall
[*] Understone Keep(Kitchen)[/list]

[UPDATES]
Please let me know, if you wish for the Ovens to be added to other locations, and I will make sure, that updates are released, as soon as enough new locations have been suggested.
author: Rajti15
